NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Thank you for providing consent for National Citizen Service (NCS)
Dear Parent or Guardian of {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for confirming that you agree to the NCS consent statement read to you over the telephone recently.
This will now enable us to progress with {!Contact.FirstName}’s application for NCS.
You can find a full copy of the consent statement here: http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/site/uploads/2016/02/2016-Consent-Statement.pdf
If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us by sending an email to inclusion.support@the-challenge.org or by calling us on 0203 542 2400.
Yours sincerely,
Tanya Dunne Head of Customer Services The Challenge (largest provider of NCS)
